tout.caption: JIMMY KIMMEL LIVE - ABC's "Jimmy Kimmel Live" returned to the host's hometown of Brooklyn, New York for five original shows which tape live from the Brooklyn Academy of Music's Howard Gilman Opera House. The guests for THURSDAY, OCTOBER 22 included actor Bradley Cooper ("Burnt"), TV personality Joy Behar ("The View"),  musical guest Esperanza Spalding and special guest sit-in with Cleto and The Cletones, Paul Shaffer ("A Very Murray Christmas").  (Photo by Randy Holmes/ABC via Getty Images)

title: Baduizm
